@chaseadamsio @GoHugoIO @Netlify @gatsbyjs Nice. You can also add a dimension to Google Analytics to let you distinguish between your branch deploys, and populate that with @Netlify snippet injection & env vars. This is useful if you want to track the results of different branches in split tests. https://t.co/WVPlyjvRH7
